name: image-handler
description: A Lambda function for performing on-demand image edits and manipulations.

scripts.build:init: rm -rf package-lock.json && rm -rf dist && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.build: npm run build:init && npm install --production && rm -rf node_modules/sharp && npm install --arch=x64 --platform=linux --target=8.10.0 sharp && npm run build:zip && npm run build:dist
